nodes.text: Xxan was a water-covered planet that was located in the Outer Rim Territories. The underwater city Acquos was located on the world, and was connected to a small spaceport on the surface of the planet, via a turbolift.
During the Clone Wars, a Jedi Padawan and the clone trooper Alpha 58 traveled to Xxan to meet with the Nautolan Zandoo.
